On Tue, 3 Apr 2001, Robert Watkins wrote:

> Joi and Mathieu,
> 
> One possibility is to nest your tests. TestX can invoke TestY if it depends
> on that behaviour.

Ooh.  I've never seen that mentioned before!  I'll have to try it!

> The other possibility is to run your tests more often. :) If you haven't
> changed much since the last successful run, you know what must have broken
> your tests even without inspecting the test output.

Well, ya, but what if you're debugging your tests? ;)  (Or some dingleberry
kills your server process and doesn't tell you?)

--
